item.description:
On discutera les thèmes qui se présenteront. Quels sont vos projets d'été - voyages? jardins? bricolage? sports?

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Please show your commitment to - and ongoing support of - this group by paying your dues in advance for 2008. If you haven't paid a yearly fee for 2008 yet, consider paying $10 for the next 6 months (July through December). Merci d'avance!

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the red and white Meetup sign on the table!
item.why: Venez boire une bonne bière (ou un vin, ou un RC Cola ? oui, ça existe encore au
